name: Fun + Learning
overview: The Fun + Learning Edutainment range by Blaze brings fun ways to learn for 5-9 year olds onto the Playstation! With 5 different fun titles, you can be sure that your child learns part of the national curriculum key stage without being bored. The 5 Fun Tasks (Mini Games) include: Snakey, Copy Cat, Puzzle, Pick me and Popper.
